Gloves of the Gladiator

nbr of attacks [nratt]: 4
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 10N to forge (N2)

These gloves are straps made from the cured skin of master gladiators. They are enchanted, weighted down with magical lead, and wrapped tightly around the hands of the wearer. The Gloves of the Gladiator are often awarded to successful gladiators in the fighting pits of Pythium.
